title: Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education: Courses, Admission, Placement 2023
meta_description: Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education - [SSAHE], Tumkur, Karnataka Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, MBBS, BE, BDS . 45 Courses. Average Fees is 1687273 per year.

basic_info.name: Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education Admission
description: The admission in all the courses is based on the Entrance Examination. Admission to MBBS, BDS is based on NEET-UG and MD, MS, MDS is based on NEET PG. Admission in BE programme is on the basis of CET and PGCET in case of M. Tech and MCA programme.

description: Candidates who wish to get admission in this college needs to follow the below-given steps:

basic_info.name: Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education Placement
description: Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education has a dedicated placement cell where every year top recruiting companies visit the campus for selecting students. Some of the names of eminent recruiters who had visited are TCS, Infosys, HP, Wipro, First American, 2 Coms and many more.
To read more click on Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education Placement

basic_info.name: Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education Scholarship
description: The university offers scholarships to residents of Karnataka under the Post Matric Scholarship for Backward Class Students introduced by Karnataka Government. Only SC/ST/ Minority Class Students are eligible to apply through the State Scholarship Portal. Students belonging to backward class can apply on the e pass portal or can contact the department of backward classes welfare.

basic_info.name: Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education Facilities
description: This Academy provides all the basic facilities to students just like every other College/Institute/ University.

Library: The Academy offers a 5-floor library, which has a seating capacity of more than 500 students. The library offers more than 67,000 journals and has a subscription to approx 156 National as well as international journals.
Hostels: The Academy offers separate hostels for Boys and Girls on “First come First serve basis”. It also has a mess facility where students can enjoy hygienic meals.
Support Amenities: Bank, facilities of ISD/STD, canteen, post office, xerox are also provided to students inside the campus only.

basic_info.name: Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education Faculty
description: The Academy has proficient and highly experienced faculty members who are well versed in their respective fields.
Get information on Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education Faculty

basic_info.name: Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education FAQs

faqs.question: What are the documents required at the time of admission in Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education?
faqs.answer: The documents that are required during the admission procedure are 10th Standard Marksheet, Caste Certificate, Passport Size Photo, MBBS/BDS/BE/BCA, Mark sheet of all semesters for PG courses, NEET UG marks card for MBBS/BDS courses, NEET PG marks card for MD/MS/MDS courses.

faqs.question: Does Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education provide admission to foreign students too?
faqs.answer: Yes, NRI students can apply for any course. They need to submit the following documents in advance: Grade Statement of Last Qualifying Exam, Passport photocopy, Nationality Certificate, Transfer Certificate, Certificate of Physical fitness, Visa etc.

faqs.question: Does Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education offer research courses?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Academy offers research programs in various fields such as Health Sciences, Engineering and Technology, Basic Sciences and Science & Technology. One can apply to this academy if wants to make their career in this field.

faqs.question: Is scholarship available for general category students in Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education?
faqs.answer: The Academy offers scholarships to backward class students as prescribed by the Karnataka State Government. There are no scholarships for students belonging to the general category. One can get more information regarding the same on the official website.

faqs.question: Does Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education offer any co-curricular activities?
faqs.answer: Yes, it offers multiple co-curricular activities like an NSS cell and NCC cell. They also provide sporting facilities such as a cricket field, football field and a basketball court.

Section.name: About SSAHE
Section.description:
Sri Siddhartha Academy of Higher education was established in 2008 and it’s a UGC recognized Deemed University. It was accredited with grade ‘A’ by NAAC. The Academy offers UG and PG courses in numerous specializations. It offers Ph.D programme in Health Sciences, Engineering and Technology, Basic Sciences & Sciences & Technology. Also, PG Diploma in numerous specializations.
Admission in all the courses is done on the basis of the Entrance Exam. The Academy provides good placement opportunities to students of different fields. Some of the names of eminent recruiters who had visited the campus are HP, Dell, TCS, Cognizant, Magna Infotech and many more.
